interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Glass spray bottle-16 ounce empty bottle ounce refillable container 2 packs, suitable for essential oils, cleaning products, aromatherapy, water mist plants with mist and air flow settings Review Date: 2020/08/14 Store: DS DOODLE SABBATH Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'DS DOODLE SABBATH', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '2.76 x 2.76 x 8.27 inches', 'Special Feature': 'Adjustable Nozzle', 'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 2.76 x 8.27 inches; 1.4 Pounds', 'UPC': '619011520959'} Review Text: I'm replacing all my pump and spray bottles with these beautiful cobalt blue
glass bottles. The sprayer version is easy to hold and spray. The sprayer is top notch even better than I was expecting . I filled one with my zero odor and I get a great fine mist . No drips or wet floor. I took the sticker off the plastic bottle and put it on my glass bottle. It came with a chalkboard type label, but I wanted my lable on this one. Review Title: Fine mist out of pretty bottle Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
IQ:Natural Eco-Smart Formula Mineral Fair 2 Foundation 12g (MED BEIGE) iQ Natural {'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Brand': 'IQ Natural', 'Skin Tone': 'Medium', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.8 x 4.1 x 1.2 inches; 0.42 Ounces'} the color of this make is so unreal I couldnt believe it. the price was good so I ordered it, I went back and looked at all of the shades and none of them look real also really light I am a light blonde and I still looked like the bride of frankenstien not worth the money to send back they need to fix the colors to human shades the mineral veil is nice will buy again sorry orange yikes GreenIVe - Anti-Age Hemp Extract Cream - Lift, Revitalize, Heal - Exclusively on Amazon (300mg) GreenIVe {'Brand': 'GreenIVe', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 2.1 x 1.7 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '810017842063'} Feels very nice , the scent is a bit earthy which I much prefer to perfumy Smooth Strixaderm Lash Advance Eyelash Conditioner - Hypo Allergenic Eyebrow Enhancer Serum & Primer Mascara For Natural Eye Brow Growth & Thick Long Lashes STRIXADERM-MD {'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 1.4 x 1.3 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '096563380000'} So far I havent seen a change. Sometimes I feel rush when ask for a review for skin or haircare. Takes time to see growth or reduced wrinkles. Please dont rush us . If I see results in the future I will edit my review. Thanks Nothing so far Hair Fibers for Thinning Hair - 100% Undetectable Natural Formula - Completely Conceals Hair Loss in 15 Seconds - 27.5 Grams (Medium Brown) Kapelli Hair {} I like this product a lot. Good color and blends right into my hair. It even colors my greys ,it rubs color into them that was a surprise to me . Ive had an inch of grey and when Ive been hiding a bald spot or thinning spots it just deposits color right into my hair. Woohoo . these products are a little itchy when they get on your scalp. Covers and colors thinning and greying hair Glass spray bottle-16 ounce empty bottle ounce refillable container 2 packs, suitable for essential oils, cleaning products, aromatherapy, water mist plants with mist and air flow settings DS DOODLE SABBATH {'Brand': 'DS DOODLE SABBATH', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '2.76 x 2.76 x 8.27 inches', 'Special Feature': 'Adjustable Nozzle', 'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 2.76 x 8.27 inches; 1.4 Pounds', 'UPC': '619011520959'} I'm replacing all my pump and spray bottles with these beautiful cobalt blue
glass bottles. The sprayer version is easy to hold and spray. The sprayer is top notch even better than I was expecting . I filled one with my zero odor and I get a great fine mist . No drips or wet floor. I took the sticker off the plastic bottle and put it on my glass bottle. It came with a chalkboard type label, but I wanted my lable on this one. Fine mist out of pretty bottle
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Primarily engages with mineral makeup, especially foundations, while exploring skincare with anti-aging benefits and eyebrow/eyelash enhancers. Recently began utilizing hair products targeted for thinning hair and greys, demonstrating a continued interest in enhancing hair appearance. Additionally, has shown an interest in quality and aesthetically pleasing utility products like glass spray bottles for various applications.
  
- **Skin Tone Consideration:** Focuses on appropriate shades for medium to fair skin tones, valuing realistic color matching and finishes. 

- **Feedback on Color Accuracy:** Strongly averse to unflattering color representations, expressing disappointment when products fail to meet expectations. Positive experiences with color matching in hair products have been noted.

- **Value and Sensitivity Analysis:** Seeks reasonably priced products while maintaining quality, showing cost-effectiveness awareness across cosmetics and hair solutions. Exhibits patience for results in skincare, preferring genuine, gradual evaluations.

- **Mixed Experiences:** Appreciates good texture and natural scents but remains cautious about repurchasing due to past negative experiences. Satisfaction with color blending and coverage has been reported, despite minor discomfort.

- **Scent Preference:** Prefers earthy over heavily perfumed products, indicating sensitivity to fragrances.

- **Overall Attitude:** Exhibits discerning behavior in reviews, valuing product efficacy clarity before forming final opinions. The latest positive review on utility products reflects an appreciation for functionality and design.
